com.example.androideye
Class RecognizerTask

java.lang.Object
  com.example.androideye.RecognizerTask
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class RecognizerTask
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable

Speech recognition task, which runs in a worker thread. This class implements speech recognition for this demo application. It takes the form of a long-running task which accepts requests to start and stop listening, and emits recognition results to a listener.

Author:
David Huggins-Daines
